name: Trickster Priest
description: The Trickster Priest is a Medium humanoid who blends mystical clerical abilities with cunning combat tactics. It has a strong presence due to its high Wisdom and utilizes a mace for melee attacks.
memorable: Its ability to create powerful illusions and provide healing makes it a formidable opponent, while its strategic use of spells can turn the tide of battle.
goals: Typically aims to heal allies, manipulate opponents, and control the battlefield with strategic spellcasting.
relations: Often associated with other spellcasters and clerics, and may serve a higher power or deity.
environment: Usually found in temples, urban areas, or locations where divine beings are venerated.
strengths: Possesses strong spellcasting capabilities in healing, damage-dealing, and area control.
weaknesses: Physical combat skills are average, making it less effective in direct confrontations.
attacks: Attacks with a mace dealing bludgeoning damage, and can add radiant damage by expending spell slots.
most_powerful_ability: Spirit Guardians, which summons spectral allies to damage opponents and create difficult terrain.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 13, indicating good awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in medicine and insight, showcasing strong capabilities in healing and social interactions.
additional_information: Can use minor illusions to deceive others.
High Wisdom grants excellent saving throw bonuses against effects that target it.
Can make allies invisible for tactical advantages.
Expends spell slots to significantly enhance melee damage.
Versatile spellcaster with a range of support and control spells.
spellcasting: A 5th level cleric with access to a range of healing, illusion, and area control spells.
test_queries: priest with powerful healing and illusions
supportive character that can heal and deceive
humanoid that deals radiant damage and heals allies
cleric with strong insight and social skills
